incident_updates.body:
Our support ticketing system is currently experiencing issues, and you may see elevated response time when raising a new ticket. Enterprise & Business customers can use our live chat system to reach us for urgent issues while we work to resolve this. We will issue further updates on this status page as we work with our providers to resolve this issue.

incidents.name: Pages users may be experiencing issues with their sites

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Users who created a Pages deployment between 16th Feb, 4:48pm UTC and 17th Feb, 3:07pm UTC and rely on custom routing (by uploading a _routes.json file) or frameworks that use custom routing (e.g. SvelteKit, Astro) may experience errors or 404s serving requests.

Affected users that are currently experiencing issues with their Pages project should redeploy.
